oai_dc:dc.dc:title: APPROXIMATE AND NUMERICAL-SOLUTIONS OF A GASEOUS FLOW WITH SHOCKS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHARMA, RR
SHARMA, VD
PANDEY, BD
SHUKLA, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A technique is provided to obtain a closed-form approximate solution and a fast-converging numerical solution to unsteady non-isentropic gas flow with two shock boundaries. The approximate treatment is found to be very close to the numerical solution.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: QUARTERLY JOURNAL OF MECHANICS AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 46(), 141-152
